title: 1.1 Core Integration Tools and Technologies
body_html:
Core Integration Tools and Technologies

Introduction to Integration Tools

In the modern digital landscape, integration tools serve as the fundamental building blocks for connecting different systems, applications, and services. This chapter explores the essential tools and technologies that form the foundation of system integration.

  • HTTP/HTTPS protocols
  • REST principles and best practices
  • API authentication and security
  • Rate limiting and optimization

GraphQL

  • Query language fundamentals
  • Schema definition
  • Resolution and data fetching
  • Real-time subscriptions

  • XML-based messaging
  • WSDL specifications
  • Enterprise service bus integration
  • Legacy system adaptation

Conclusion

Understanding and effectively implementing these core integration tools and technologies is crucial for building robust, scalable, and maintainable integrated systems. The next chapters will build upon these foundations to explore more advanced integration scenarios.
